attributes.action: Rishi Sunak to resign as wife has income from russia
attributes.additional_details: Sack Rishi Sunak for being a party to funds originating in Russia.
attributes.background: Given that sanctions are in place to prevent funds or wealth emanating from Russia, it is only just and proper that anyone with financial links should face sanctioning.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions relating to honours or appointments. This includes petitions calling for individual Ministers to resign from the Government, as this is a matter for those Ministers and the Prime Minister.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418

Seize frozen Russian assets and give proceeds to Ukraine to help with rebuilding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610119
